user_question: How do volcanic eruptions affect global climate patterns, and can you generate an image of a volcanic eruption?
final_answer: Volcanic eruptions can inject large quantities of ash and sulfur dioxide into the atmosphere, which can lead to temporary global cooling by reflecting sunlight away from the Earth. Image of a volcanic eruption generated.
